Emergency Assist is exclusively designed for people who needs to send emrgency message during emergency. Add phone number to Emergency Assists and whenever you press the Volume Up button long, the sms will be sent out to these recipients alo0ng with your GPS/Network Location(a Google Maps link) and a personalized message will go to each contact. If you or a loved ever walk through a dark alley, travel abroad or just need to alert someone of your whereabouts - this button(Volume Up) will simplify explaining exactly where you are.Help can come faster and within GPS accuracy.
Installation:
Search Emergecy Assist on Google Play and click on Install. This will install the application on your Android Phone.
